Posts.EditableText: The 'explorer' trophy is the only one that you get randomly.  I did it so as to whet the appetite for the others.  The other 4 trophies you have to work for- by perhaps doing something you wouldn't normally do on the course of the quest.  There is one that you cannot get until you finish the game.  But you can finish the game without getting any of the trophies.
